Package org.svvrl.goal.core

Class CorePlugin

java.lang.Object
org.java.plugin.Plugin
org.java.plugin.boot.ApplicationPlugin
org.svvrl.goal.core.CorePlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.java.plugin.boot.Application
public class CorePlugin
extends org.java.plugin.boot.ApplicationPlugin
implements org.java.plugin.boot.Application
The CorePlugin is the entry point of GOAL. This class loads several core extensions and then hands over the control to either a ConsoleHandler object or an UIHandler object depends on the existence of console arguments.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • APPLICATION_ROOT

      public static final java.lang.String APPLICATION_ROOT
      The base directory of the application. This is obtained from the property "applicationRoot". If the property is not set, the directory will be ".".
